languages.text: "Да, хотя это и был долгий путь. Но теперь он не уйдет с этой станции никогда. Клянусь".
"Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."
languages.original_text: "Да, хотя это и был долгий путь. Но теперь он не уйдет с этой станции никогда. Клянусь".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, albeit its journey was far too long. But it will never release its grip on this station again. I vow to see to it."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, albeit its journey was far too long. But it will never release its grip on this station again. I vow to see to it."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, albeit its journey was far too long. But it will never release its grip on this station again. I vow to see to it."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, albeit its journey was far too long. But it will never release its grip on this station again. I vow to see to it."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “没错，虽然这是场漫长的旅程，但落脚港再也不会沦为法外之地了。我发誓会实现这个目标。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: “没错，虽然这是场漫长的旅程，但落脚港再也不会沦为法外之地了。我发誓一定会实现这个目标。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「ああ、そうだ。しかし、その旅はあまりにも長すぎた。だが、このステーションの支配を手放す事は二度とないだろう。約束する」
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうだ。しかし、その旅はあまりにも長すぎた。だが、このステーションの支配を手放す事は二度とないだろう。約束する」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Sí, aunque su viaje ha sido demasiado largo. Pero nunca volverá a perder el control de esta estación. Lo juro».
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, aunque su viaje ha sido demasiado largo. Pero nunca volverá a tener el control de esta estación. Me comprometo a velar por ello».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ja, auch wenn die Reise hierher viel zu lange gedauert hat. Doch nun wird die Station nie wieder ohne sein. Das schwöre ich."
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, auch wenn es viel zu lange gedauert hat. Doch nun wird die Station nie wieder ohne sein. Dafür sorge ich, das schwöre ich."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « En effet, même si cela aura pris bien trop de temps. Mais maintenant, elle ne relâchera jamais son emprise sur cette station. J'en fais le serment. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, même si cela aura pris un peu trop de temps. Mais maintenant, elle ne relâchera jamais son emprise sur cette station. J'en fais le serment. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Evet, öyle oldu. Her ne kadar bu yolculuk çok uzun sürmüş olsa da. Ancak bu istasyondaki hükmü bir daha asla yok olmayacak. Ant içiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Yes, it has, although its journey here took far too long. But never again will it release its grip on this station. I vow it."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, öyle oldu. Her ne kadar bu yolculuk çok uzun sürmüş olsa da. Ancak bu istasyondaki hükmü bir daha asla yok olmayacak. Ant içiyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
